DOC.brief_summary: The present study aim evaluate effect combination insulin resistance reduce agent pre post coronary artery bypass graft surgery post-operative blood glucose oxidative stress regulation .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Insulin Resistance Reducing Agents Pre Post CABG Post-operative Metabolic Status Oxidative Stress
DOC.detailed_description: The present study aim evaluate effect combination insulin resistance reduce agent pre post coronary artery bypass graft surgery post-operative blood glucose oxidative stress regulation . The sample size estimate 92 ( 23 group ) . The participant study select non-diabetic patient schedule CABG . The patient allocate four group use balanced block randomization method : 1 . Consumption supplement ( 20 gram pack supplement daily ) 7 day surgery placebo ( pack starch ) 30 day post surgery 2 . Consumption placebo 7 day surgery supplement 30 day post surgery 3 . Consumption supplement 7 day 30 day post surgery 4 . Consumption placebo 7 day 30 day post surgery One week , onset surgery , surgery , 1 week 4 week operation , blood sample take level hemoglobin A1C , glucose , insulin malondialdehyde measure . Also , body composition index assess four time : one week surgery , onset surgery , 1 week 4 week surgery .
DOC.criteria: Mean age 3070 year old , Having Coronary Artery Disease Undergoing coronary artery bypass graft surgery Positive history diabetes mellitus , metabolic , hematological , immune disorder , renal problem , cerebrovascular accident Taking antioxidant supplement Cases emergency operation Ejection Fraction < 30 %
